```{r setup}
library (tidyverse)
```

## `pivot_longer`

```{r}
pulse_data =
  haven:: read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor:: clean_names()

```
Wide format to long format....

```{r}
pulse_data_tidy=
  pulse_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m, 
    names_to= "visit",
    names_prefix="bdi_score_",
    values_to="bdi"
  )
```
rewrite, combine extend (to add a mutate)

```{r}
pulse_data =
  haven:: read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor:: clean_names() %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m, 
    names_to= "visit",
    names_prefix="bdi_score_",
    values_to="bdi"
) %>% 
  relocate(id,visit) %>% 
  mutate(visit= recode(visit, "bl"="00m"))
```
## `pivot_wider`

Make up some data

```{r}
analysis_result=
  tibble(
    group=c("treatment", "treatment", "placebo", "placebo"),
    time=c("pre", "post", "pre", "post"),
    mean=c(4, 8, 3.5, 4)
  )

analysis_result %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from="time",
    values_from="mean"
  )

```
